definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章報道了地被菊在海南引種的適應性情況。

sentences.english: In 1992~1993, introduction and forestation of Taiwania were made in Suichang County of Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 年在浙江省遂昌縣對二樹種進行了引種造林試驗。

sentences.english: Cherry fasciated disease is a disease which was found in the cherry sapling imported from Israel.
sentences.chinese: 櫻桃帶化病是從以色列引種櫻桃園中發現的新病害。

sentences.english: The growth and development of T.
sentences.chinese: 南京引種的銀鵲樹生長髮育良好。

sentences.english: Test of introduced 6 varities of Pennisetum was conducted in Doumen area of Zhuhai city.
sentences.chinese: 對6個狼尾草屬牧草在珠海市斗門區進行引種試驗。

sentences.english: Introduction test was succeed in greenhouse Ge-er-mu 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年在本地進行引種試驗，大棚種植初獲成功。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution and introduction of Tapiscia sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 銀鵲樹的地理分佈和引種。

sentences.english: The introduction experiment of pearl variety of Psidium guajava was conducted in the subtropical area of Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 在貴州亞熱帶地區對珍珠番石榴進行了引種試驗。

sentences.english: During the past several years, the cultivation study of the hamimelon introduction to the east and the south had been performed.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，哈密瓜南進東移的引種栽培研究備受關注。

sentences.english: This paper reports the experimental results of the introduction of Japanese cucumis Melo in Nothern Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道日本網紋甜瓜在桂北地區引種結果。

sentences.english: Finally, the introduction and cultivation of this genus are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 並介紹了蘆薈屬植物的引種栽培工作。

sentences.english: The introduction experiment of Jatropha curcas L. is studied in Nan'an County in Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 在福建南安市進行麻瘋樹引種育苗造林試驗。

sentences.english: The results above had conductive significance for plant introduction and selection of tree species.
sentences.chinese: 這對植物引種和樹種選擇有一定的指導意義。

sentences.english: The information provided references for American Ginseng planting in the region.
sentences.chinese: 旨在爲推廣西洋參的引種栽培提供參考。

sentences.english: The results showed that this species could be introduced to cultivate successfully at lower altitude .
sentences.chinese: 研究結果暗示紅波羅花能夠在較低海拔地區引種栽培。

sentences.english: Reformation and opening door policy provide a very good opportunity to crop introduction.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放爲國外引種提供了良好機遇。

definition: to open up land for cultivation
"kopi luwak" or civet coffee, made from coffee beans plucked from Asian palm civet's feces
